responses.s0_q0: Yes: The strategy is documented, covers all 12 NDP domains, and is reviewed/updated annually.
responses.s0_q1: Partially: Some governance roles or committees exist, but not a full unit or office.
responses.s0_q2: Partially: A policy exists but is not fully aligned or not widely communicated.
responses.s0_q3: Yes: All roles and responsibilities are documented and assigned.
responses.s1_q0: Yes: A comprehensive architecture exists, is documented, and regularly updated.
responses.s1_q2: No: No models have been reviewed or approved by NPC.
responses.s2_q0: Yes: The policy is published and aligned with national standards.
responses.s2_q1: No: No data quality program exists.
responses.s2_q2: Yes: Scorecards and KPIs are implemented and actively monitored.
responses.s3_q0: Yes: A formal, published policy exists and is aligned with national standards.
responses.s3_q1: No: No MDM program or plan exists.
responses.s3_q2: Partially: Some coordination/approval has occurred, but not comprehensively.
responses.s4_q0: No: No such policy or program exists.
responses.s4_q1: Partially: Some digitalization efforts are underway, but not comprehensive.
responses.s5_q0: Yes: A comprehensive catalog and metadata system is in place and maintained.
responses.s5_q1: Partially: Some alignment exists, but not comprehensive.
responses.s6_q1: Partially: Some solutions are compliant, but not all.
responses.s7_q0: Yes: A formal, published policy exists.
responses.s7_q1: Yes: All data sharing is secure and compliant.
responses.s7_q2: Yes: Actively participates in the National Data Marketplace.
responses.s8_q0: Yes: Programs are fully aligned and regularly reviewed.
responses.s8_q1: Yes: A documented and structured portfolio exists.
responses.s8_q2: Partially: Some compliance, but not comprehensive.
responses.s9_q0: No: No data monetization opportunities identified.
responses.s9_q1: No: No such program or plan.
responses.s10_q0: Partially: Some compliance, but gaps remain.
responses.s10_q1: Yes: All assets are classified per policy.
responses.s11_q0: Yes: A formal program is in place and active.
responses.s11_q1: Yes: Curriculums and learning paths are defined and aligned.
